title: Nice Business Card Font
content:
Hi :)  
Does anyone know this font?

Thanks,  
David

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102726im_/http:/typophile.com/files/maru_5455.jpg)

Font: 

 Gravur Condensed 

Solved By: 

 [akira1975](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102726/http:/typophile.com/user/4504 "View user profile.")
author: davidbenzur

comments.content:
On the website (maru.no), they use FF Din Round: [https://www.fontfont.com/fonts/din-round](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102726/https:/www.fontfont.com/fonts/din-round "https://www.fontfont.com/fonts/din-round")  
Which could be a match. Except for |@|, which, to me, seems lifted from a different typeface.
